Package org.jsfml.window.event

Class SizeEvent

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.window.event.Event
org.jsfml.window.event.SizeEvent
public final class SizeEvent extends Event
Represents window resize events.

Objects of this class are created for events of type Event.Type.RESIZED.

      public final Vector2i size

  • Constructor Details

    • SizeEvent

      public SizeEvent(int type, int width, int height)
      Constructs a new window resize event.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the event. This must be a valid ordinal in the Event.Type enumeration.
      width - the new width of the window in pixels.
      height - the new height of the window in pixels.

  • Method Details

    • asSizeEvent

      public SizeEvent asSizeEvent()
      Description copied from class: Event
      Attempts to cast this event to a SizeEvent.
      Overrides:
      asSizeEvent in class Event
      Returns:
      the event cast to a SizeEvent if its type is Event.Type.RESIZED, null otherwise.
